name: Basketball: The Pro Game
overview: Basketball: The Pro Game lets you coach your favorite NBA teams, both present and past! Realism and excitement are the trademarks of this strategy-simulation. Talk about dream matchups? How about the '85 Celtics with Larry Bird against the '72 Lakers with a young Kareem Abdul Jabbar or the '84 Sixers with Moses and Dr. J vs. the '70's Knicks powered by Willis Reed, Dave DeBusschere and Walt Frazier. The Pro game features the 23 NBA teams from '86-'87 and more than 125 great teams of the past.
